name: Ship Mate
description:
Unfinished card game about moving ships across the open waters to escape with the gold.

Place the ships on the board, and try to plan ahead to avoid the bombs being dropped from the planes.

The boats have different movement.

Control with mouse. 

Press R to restart the game

Built in Godot. Some models built in Asset Forge.
Some models from https://kaylousberg.itch.io/kay-kit-mini-game-variety-pack
Some other models from https://kaylousberg.itch.io/kaykit-medieval-builder-pack
